1111000101111011 0001010110100101 0 -> sum: 0000011100100000, cout: 1

0110001001101000 1011111110101010 1 -> sum: 0010001000010011, cout: 1
0100100111011111 0100101001100001 1 -> sum: 1001010001000001, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
